original_text: The Israelites became rich and fat. 32: The Israelites are here called by a special name, ‘ Jeshurun ’. They turned against God. They were full of good food, but they turned away from God. He was the one who made them. He was the strong Rock who kept them safe. But they no longer respected him. The Israelites became rich and fat.
korean_text: 그런데 여수룬이 기름지매 발로 찼도다 네가 살찌고 비대하고 윤택하매 자기를 지으신 하나님을 버리고 자기를 구원하신 반석을 업신여겼도다

sentences.original_text: The Israelites became rich and fat
The Israelites are here called by a special name, 'Jeshurun'
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성들은 여기서 '예수룬'이라는 특별한 이름으로 불린다

sentences.original_text: They were full of good food
but they turned away from God
He was the one who made them
He was the strong Rock who kept them safe
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들을 안전하게 지켜주시는 강한 반석이시다

sentences.original_text: But they no longer respected him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 더 이상 그를 존경하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: The Israelites became rich and fat
